game_description: Practice and perfect all-important soft skills in Bodyswaps - an award winning psychologically safe VR tool that combines behavioural science and AI data with realistic workplace scenarios. Experience role play like never before to build skills like: - Active listening - Clear communication - Gender inclusion - Understanding and resolving conflict - Giving feedback - Career mindset development - Job interview skills - And more... Through our 15 minute simulations, you will… Observe, analyse and identify best (and worst) practice. Explore your impact on others with simulated conversations where the outcomes reflect your choices. Deliver an intervention in your own words, then Bodyswap to see your performance from another person’s perspective. And fast-track personal development with truly personalised feedback and guidance from AI-enabled behavioural and semantic analyses.
review_1: Less about the body swapping (but you do get to do that) and more of a general workplace, umm, being polite teacher tool. It's of very high quality and choreography.
review_2: This app is the future of learning. You interact with avatars addressing work issues and situations using your own voice and it reflects this back to you with feedback and analysis.
